entry.title: Merit 84019 - 1 Inch X 8mm - 32 Eyelet Mount 80 Grit Aluminum Oxide Overlap Slotted Disc(2 Set) 08834184019
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merit
Type: 2 Set Overlap Slotted Discs
Price: 1.24

[shortdesc]
  • Overlap slotted discs are used for deburring and polishing radii, holes and cylinder walls
  • The 2/set configuration cuts on the inward motion only, while the 4/set configuration cut on both the inward and outward motion
  • All are furnished with a standard Quick-Change eyelet.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Merit
    Diameter 1 Inch
    Grit 80
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type 2 Set Overlap Slotted Discs

    Product Information

  • Quality aluminum oxide abrasive grain for versatile
  • ideal for deburring, chamfering, and polishing most radii, holes, recesses, and cylinder walls
  • X-wt
  • cotton cloth and resin bond for excellent grain retention and life
  • Standard quick-change eyelet for easy mounting to quick-change mandrel for fast, easy mounting and removal
  • Resin bond system for good grain retention and life
    		•
